job.title: Machine Learning Software Engineer
job.description:
Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Trading Systems - Prestigious Prop Trading Firm - Austin



I’m working with a very well-known and prestigious trading firm who are looking to make a key hire in their Software Engineering/Machine Learning team. This team work hand-in-hand with traders and quant researchers to build and improve their machine-learning based trading systems. The team has grown steadily over the past 7 years and now one of their leading business initiatives is to scale this team to become as large and profitable as their other trading groups.


  • Implement ML features, models, and strategies for use in backtest, simulation, and production. 
  • Manage an in-house compute and data cluster, job scheduler, and Python-based pipeline to provide robust, efficient 24/7 backtest/simulation/research environment. 
  • Develop low-level Linux C/C++ software with FPGA integration to achieve world-class latencies. 


This is an extremely exciting opportunity which is not only very lucrative, but also offers significant advancement opportunities as the firm continues to dominate this space.


There is a very generous compensation package on offer. Unfortunately, this firm is not currently offering sponsorship at this time.
